===Noun===
{{ja-noun|うけつけ}}

# [[receipt]], [[reception]], [[acceptance]]
# [[receptionist]], [[information]] [[clerk]]
# information [[office]], information [[desk]]

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|受け付け}}: Less common form
* {{l|ja|受付け}}
* {{l|ja|受け付}}: Least common form

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* {{l|ja|予約受付}} (''yoyaku uketsuke''): reservation, order acceptance
* {{l|ja|予約受付係}} (''yoyaku uketsukekei''): person whose job is to take reservations
* {{l|ja|受付中}} (''uketsukechū''): currently accepting
* {{l|ja|受付係}} (''uketsukegakari''): receptionist, clerk
{{der-mid}}
* {{l|ja|受付嬢}} (''uketsukejō''): receptionist, reception woman
* {{l|ja|着呼受付不可信号}} (''chakko uketsuke fuka shingō''): call-not-accepted signal
* {{l|ja|着呼受付信号}} (''chakko uketsuke shingō''): call-accepted signal
{{der-bottom}}
